name: Spinning Santa
description:
Spinning Santa Is Nice Christmas Game



"Spinning Santa" is a christmas balancing game. Santa is spin with his hands. You just balance him with your power & touch the target position.

# Game Features.....

* Four key to balance the spinning santa.

* 6 levels with beautiful backgrounds.

* Collect stars during moving time & earn 100 points for each star.

* Touch your target points & collect 150 points.

* Flexible to share your highest score in game center.

* Try to complete 6 levels & make a historical score in game center.
